item.title: Publications
item.description: Publications Cazelles K. , Araújo M., Mouquet N., Gravel D. (2015). A theory for species co-occurrence in interaction networks. Theoretical Ecology 9 (1). 10.1007/s12080-015-0281-9 Harvey E., Marleau J., Gounand I., Leroux S., Firkowski C., Altermatt F., Guillaume Blanchet F., Cazelles K. , Chu C., D'Aloia C., Donelle L., Gravel D., Guichard F., McCann K., Ruppert J., Ward C., Fortin M. (2023). A general meta‐ecosystem model to predict ecosystem functions at landscape extents.
